channel.title: Sebastian Bensusan's blog
channel.description: On APIs and random things I find interesting

item.title: APIs as ladders
item.description: Developers have opinions on what a good API 1 is, but rarely have a shared vocabulary to describe what makes them good. This essay puts forward one set of considerations (out of many) that we started using at Stripe in 2019 to discuss API design2. If you read carefully, you can find some of these concepts interspersed in this excellent blogpost by Michelle Bu.

item.title: The secondary market in gift cards
item.description: This post by patio11 covers a few things that I learned working with gift cards over the years.
